name: Rockbreaker
description:
Take on the role of Eda Rockbreaker, a dwarven lady who's love for loot is almost as big as her beard, on her quest to dig as deep as possible in search of gems!

This game was created in 48 hours for the Yogscast Game Jam 2020 by a team of three people!

Character Design was done by Poke (Twitter | Tumblr)

Eda Portrait, Logo design and Thumbnail art by Doodlele (Twitter)

Programming and spritework by Beahives (Twitter)
